sen.j: 灯火目付（とうかめつけ）は忍者の肉体鍛錬法の一つ。
sen.e: Tokametsuke is one of physical trainings of Ninja (a secret agent in feudal Japan highly skilled in stealth and secrecy).
Tokametsuke was one of the physical trainings of Ninja (a secret agent in feudal Japan highly skilled in stealth and secrecy).
sen.cmt: 時制や表現を修正し、より自然になるように致しました。
sen.e: Tokametsuke was one of the physical trainings of Ninja (a secret agent in feudal Japan highly skilled in stealth and secrecy).

sen.j: 視力を養うために用いられる。
sen.e: It is used for cultivating eyesight.
It was used to improve eyesight.
sen.cmt: 時制や表現を修正し、より自然になるように致しました。
sen.e: It was used to improve eyesight.

sen.j: 暗い部屋で行灯に火をらせ、和紙の部分に針で穴を適当な数だけ開け、その穴を遠くから数える。
sen.e: Lighting an Andon (a paper-covered lamp stand), creating a moderate number of holes on Washi (Japanese paper), and counting the holes from a distance.

In Tokametsuke, an Andon (a paper-covered lamp stand) was lit in a dark room, and a reasonable number of holes were pricked on its parts made of Washi (Japanese paper), and from a distance, the numbers of those holes were counted.
sen.cmt: 時制や、表現を修正し、より自然なものになるように致しました。
sen.e: In Tokametsuke, an Andon (a paper-covered lamp stand) was lit in a dark room, and a reasonable number of holes were pricked on its parts made of Washi (Japanese paper), and from a distance, the numbers of those holes were counted.

sen.j: この動作を毎日行い、次第に穴の数を増やしていく。
sen.e: Carry out these activities everyday, increasing the number of holes gradually.
The exercise was carried out every day, and gradually the numbers of the holes were increased.
sen.cmt: 時制や、表現を修正し、より自然なものになるように致しました。
sen.e: The exercise was carried out every day, and gradually the numbers of the holes were increased.

sen.j: また、視力を鍛える他の方法として、真っ暗な部屋や押し入れと明るい部屋を何度も行き来する方法が伝えられている。
sen.e: Also, another method to cultivate eyesight is that come and go between dark room such as a closet and bright room many times.
Another method which was passed down for improving eyesight was to repeatedly come and go between a dark room or a closet and a bright room.
sen.cmt: 時制や、表現を修正し、より自然なものになるように致しました。
sen.e: Another method which was passed down for improving eyesight was to repeatedly come and go between a dark room or a closet and a bright room.

sen.j: 忍者は、上記のような方法等で視力を鍛えるだけでなく、山椒を摂取する事で視力を高めていたとされる。
sen.e: Ninja seemed to cultivate eyesight not only by using the above methods, but also by ingesting Sansho (Japanese pepper).
The Ninja were considered to have improved their eyesight not only through the methods described above, but also through the ingestion of Sansho (Japanese pepper).
sen.cmt: 時制や、表現を修正し、より自然なものになるように致しました。
sen.e: The Ninja were considered to have improved their eyesight not only through the methods described above, but also through the ingestion of Sansho (Japanese pepper).
